abstractText: A sample (site) weight isused with aGeneralized Random Tessellation Stratified (GRTS) - based sampling design andcan be thought of as anexpansion factor, or the number of km that a particular site represents when expanded to the whole spawning distribution, estimation area, or by strata (group).This metric is used when calculating Total Spawner Abundance ( method ID: 5409)
title: Sample (Site) Weight v1.0
